summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Mead Street, from 51st Avenue South to 52nd Avenue South, and 51st Avenue South from Orcas Street to Mead Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 4949, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
